intro.content: Criando M√∫sicas is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information in compliance with applicable data protection laws.

items: Registration data: Name, email, phone, and WhatsApp

dataSharing.intro: We do not sell your personal data. We may share information with:

Technology service providers that assist us
Public authorities when required by law

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.intro: You have the following rights regarding your data:
items: Confirm the existence of data processing
Access your personal data
Correct incomplete or outdated data
Request anonymization, blocking, or deletion of data
Request data portability
Revoke consent at any time
Obtain information about data sharing

dataSecurity.title: 7. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement technical and organizational measures to protect your data, including encryption, access control, and security monitoring. We store your data on secure servers and follow market best practices.

retention.title: 8. Data Retention
retention.content: We keep your data for the time necessary to provide services and comply with legal obligations. After this period, data is securely deleted or anonymized.

cookies.content: We use cookies to improve your experience. You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings.
